title: Inflation Dynamics and Monetary Policy
content: -2  0  2  4  6  8  10  12  14  -2  0  2  4  6  8  10  12  14  1960 1965 1970 1975 1980 1985 1990 1995 2000 2005 2010 2015  Total PCE price index   Core PCE price index  Q2 Long-term trend  4-quarter percent change  Note: The data are quarterly.  The data for the long-term trend start in 1965:Q1.  PCE is personal consumption  expenditures.  Source: U.S. Department of Commerce, Bureau of Economic Analysis; Federal Reserve Board staff calculations  (see note 3 of speech text for additional discussion).
